definition: Bhopal, capital of central Indian state of Madhya Pradesh 中央邦[Zhong1 yang1 bang1]

sentences.english: In Bhopal, which bills itself as the City of Lakes, patience is already at breaking point.
sentences.chinese: 在博帕爾這個自稱爲城市之湖的地方，耐性已經崩潰。

sentences.english: But Popal was more than just a former mujahideen.
sentences.chinese: 但博帕爾並不僅僅只是一名前穆斯林游擊隊員。

sentences.english: Bhopal remains the worst industrial disaster ever.
sentences.chinese: 博帕爾事件仍然是有史以來最嚴重的工業災難。
